scripts.lint: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-js
scripts.postinstall: yarn run prepatch && yarn run patch && yarn run postinstall-mirador
scripts.postinstall-mirador: cd node_modules/mirador && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.validate-iiif-gnu: find docs -name manifest.json -print0 | xargs -r -0 -n1 yarn run jsonlint -c
scripts.validate-gjson-gnu: find docs -name '*.gjson' -o -name '*.geojson' -print0 | xargs -r -0 -n1 yarn run jsonlint -c
scripts.validate-iiif-bsd: find docs -name manifest.json -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 yarn run jsonlint -c -q
scripts.validate-gjson-bsd: find docs -name '*.gjson' -o -name '*.geojson' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 yarn run jsonlint -c -q
scripts.validate-iiif: case $OSTYPE in darwin*) yarn run validate-iiif-bsd ;; linux*) yarn run validate-iiif-gnu ;; bsd*) yarn run validate-iiif-bsd ;; *)  exit 100 ;; esac
scripts.validate-gjson: case $OSTYPE in darwin*) yarn run validate-gjson-bsd ;; linux*) yarn run validate-gjson-gnu ;; bsd*) yarn run validate-gjson-bsd ;; *)  exit 100 ;; esac
scripts.validate: yarn run validate-iiif && yarn run validate-gjson
